product_title: Pure Cotton Striped Oversized Girlfriend Style Shirt
description: A subtle striped print gives this pure cotton shirt a smart look. It's cut in a regular fit with a flattering longline curved hem. Button cuffs and a collared neck offer a neat finish. We've added a single pocket to the button-down front for a dash of extra detail. We only ever use responsibly sourced cotton for our clothes. M&S Collection: easy-to-wear wardrobe staples that combine classic and contemporary styles.
